questions.scenario: You stand at the edge of a sunlit forest. The path ahead splits. Which way calls to you?

choices.text: A sun-drenched meadow path lined with wildflowers.
A shaded trail beneath ancient, mossy oaks.

questions.scenario: Deeper in, you find a small stream. The water flows over smooth stones. What do you do?

choices.text: Dip your hands in the cool, clear water.
Sit on a warm rock and listen to the flow.

questions.scenario: A gentle breeze stirs the leaves. You spot something in the distance.

choices.text: A hidden garden of white jasmine and citrus trees.
A cozy wooden cabin with smoke rising from the chimney.

questions.scenario: The sun begins to set, painting the sky in gold and violet. The air changes.

choices.text: It turns crisp and cool, carrying the scent of pine.
It turns warm and heavy with the scent of blooming night flowers.

questions.scenario: Stars appear above. You find a place to rest. What surrounds you?

choices.text: Open sky, moonlight, and the sound of wind in the grass.
The crackle of a fire, soft blankets, and silence.

outcomes.title: THE QUIET SOUL
outcomes.desc: You find beauty in depth and stillness. Your sanctuary is built on comfort, warmth, and cherished memories.
